title: Trump Has A Suggestion For Kavanaugh: Here's How You Should Handle The Lame Stream Media
text:
After the New York Times published an article claiming to have a new witness and a new sexual assault allegation against Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh, President Donald Trump took to Twitter to slam the mainstream media for dragging Kavanaugh through the mud.

According to President Trump, Kavanaugh should be filing lawsuits against various people and news organizations for libel, especially about "false accusations without recrimination."

Now the Radical Left Democrats and their Partner, the LameStream Media, are after Brett Kavanaugh again, talking loudly of their favorite word, impeachment. He is an innocent man who has been treated HORRIBLY. Such lies about him. They want to scare him into turning Liberal! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) September 15, 2019

Brett Kavanaugh should start suing people for libel, or the Justice Department should come to his rescue. The lies being told about him are unbelievable. False Accusations without recrimination. When does it stop? They are trying to influence his opinions. Can’t let that happen! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) September 15, 2019

Trump believes these accusations are being brought forward because of Kavanaugh's conservative opinions and the mainstream media's desire to protect leftist policies. And he's onto something. Remember, Dr. Christine Blasey Ford's attorney, Debra Katz, admitted Ford came forward with her allegations because of Kavanaugh's "attack" on Roe v. Wade.

If Ramirez's story was credible then why did it take the Times almost a year to corroborate her story? If the new accuser, Max Steiner, was so willing to talk about what he saw, why didn't he go to news outlets, especially liberal mainstream media rags like the Times or WaPo, when the accusations first came out? Or even during the confirmation process? The timeline should tell you something.
